players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Looks like Diana was targeted by the mafia last night. I think we should focus on who might have had a motive to kill her. Any suspicious behavior so far?"
You: "I agree with Charlie. We should look for any odd behavior from last night or today."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and discovered they are the mafioso. We should vote for them."
Charlie: "Bob, your accusation is baseless and clearly a desperate attempt to divert suspicion from yourself. Why would I admit to being the mafia so openly? This feels like a ploy to frame me."
You: "Bob's accusation against Charlie is our only lead right now. We should consider voting for Charlie to verify his claim."
Bob: "I stand by my investigation—Charlie is the mafioso. We must vote him out to end this threat."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
